name: Black Fang Magician
desc:
Pendulum Effect
Once per turn: You can target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; its ATK becomes half its current ATK, then destroy this card. This ATK change lasts until the end of this turn (even if this card leaves the field).

Monster Effect
(This card is always treated as an "Xyz Dragon" card.)
If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can target 1 DARK Spellcaster-Type monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon it.
